name: Experience Beautiful Saigon+Chinatown
description:
" Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines, sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." - Mark Twain. 

I indulge myself in reading this inspiring travel quote. Therefore,I believe that traveling lets us open our minds to new things and we get to experience life in exciting different ways. I myself can't wait to experience with you to get closer to the hidden beauty of Saigon and Saigon's Chinatown, the must-visited tourist of attraction in Saigon.

Are you ready to begin the journey with me? It will be much more exciting in reality that I show you...
